Reviews.Title: “Avoid this place.”
Reviews.Author: ambadkar
Reviews.Content: I would never like to be caught dead in this hotel! I was forced to stay here as there was unusual tourist rush and all good hotels were overbooked. Beds are horrible, TV is outdated 20" CRT type, bathrooms are cramped and stinking, furniture is broken at places, clothes hangers are pathetic, there is no iron...... Breakfast was horrible. The hotel needs to be sealed.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably priced close to metro station”
Reviews.Author: zakir460
Reviews.Content: THe hotel is a 3 star and is good for transport links. Its only 5-7 mins walking distance from the Al Rigga station, which is a underground subway rail system

Reviews.Title: “poor hotel but not so bad for budget”
Reviews.Author: BandarAbbasHamid
Reviews.Content: location is not bad.poor breakfast and lunch buffet.poor iranian and indian night club in hotel.its good only for its low budget.it have very small restaurant and not good for families with children.u often have to wait out of restaurant to find a place for breakfast or lunch .i offer it only for singles and freinds trip.the only pool is in roof and have dirty water and u cant use it.

Reviews.Title: “Worst experience at hotel and is it a brothel?”
Reviews.Author: A D
Reviews.Content: Uncaring hotel, dismissive staff and filthy. We were all bitten overnight and had to seek medical advice. Food was appauling. Rooms appeared to be rented out on an hourly basis for casual liaisons between couples. A guest with a 17 year old son was horrified as he was being solicited.

Reviews.Title: “Last Option In Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Persia1971
Reviews.Content: Exactly it is my last option among my hotels in Dubai,Just for sleep in,Nothing special About this Hotel ,only Budget & central,even in this case there are a lot more better Hotels which have these two last characteristics

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I ever had.”
Reviews.Author: bloodyle
Reviews.Content: Beside that they keep your Passport at the reception in a open stackpile of dozens of other guests passports. If you want it back you have to pay your full booking upfront plus leave a deposit as 'security'. Besides that they rise roomrates 'as needed'. Besides that there is only after begging any roomservice. Beside that the rooms are dirty at most. Beside that the bathrooms tabs are at most dripping water. Besides that you cannot change your booking without loosing your upfront payed money. Besides that you have to squeeze yourself through the tiny Lobby. Besides that the food is incredibly bad. Besides that your neighbors will keep you up all night because they went to one of the nightclubs downstairs or the beer-room upstairs and they are drunken and bring girls. Besides all that - they have the unfriendliest guy at the reception I have ever met. It's even a challenge, I sort of motivate you to go there and experiennce this kind of 'anti-attraction'. Try this Hotel and keep it as a Souvenvir of bad habits in your mind.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Morgan0000
Reviews.Content: People at the registrar were dimissive rude and dimissive at best. The entire hotel is in a terrible condition. The waer temperature never got much warmer than body temerature, the toilets would need avery healthy person to flush, since you have to pump the flush handle in very rapid and feverish repetitions for a long time for it to flush. The cleaning crew were all nice people and they tried to help and I am gretful to them, but the people nehind the reception desk were very rude, uncooperative and dishonest. The noise from the so called disco tech will keep you up for most of the night. Do not get any food ordered from their kitchen because you wil not be able to eat it. It was a terrible experince, except for meeting the house keeping guys who are wonderful people and I am gretful to them for trying to help to make the situation better, but the problem is beyound than their abilities to fix.

Reviews.Title: “Most economical and aptly placed”
Reviews.Author: master8
Reviews.Content: This can prove to be one of the most economical and centrally placed hotels in Dubai. Its right in the heart of the city.

Reviews.Title: “Just Note Down - Never Stay here”
Reviews.Author: MJX
Reviews.Content: As far as I can recall, this is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. (I should not even call it a hotel, its a logde or guest house). I never book hotel without looking over the Internet, but we had a stopover at Dubai Airport for 14 hours and we decided to go out. For Visa they need a confirmed Hotel booking (Basically a way to charge you) The Arabian Adventure Travel agents at the Airport charged us USD 130 for this hotel, they told us its very nice hotel close to the City Centre. Looking at the Price, I thought it better be good. But we were Shocked when we checked-in, the room was 10ft x 10 ft, dirty linen looks like they bought it in second hand market in 1991. The bathroom was stinking, the pillows were non-existent, we somehow managed to take bath and get out of the place. The staff was rude, they kept us waiting at the lobby for airport drop and told me if I am in hurry I should take a Cab and not wait for them. Another Iranian couple with us was struggling with them for their luggage stored in Clock room. Just take care that if you are going to Dubai or just happen to be there, first Warning - Dont deal with Arabian Adventure, even if you deal dont stay at Semiramis...

Reviews.Title: “possible”
Reviews.Author: semirarmis
Reviews.Content: ok if you like dirty coffee cups outside your room for 5 days, the funny thing was it was next to the house keeping trolley! which was also there for 5 days! , 2 night clubs that played loud music that reached the 5 th floor , breakfast was a mixture of fruit salad i.e an apple , and other guests screaming children late at night and early in the morning , we where happy to put up with it but decided not to eventualy we had enough and decided to check out and book into another hotel even though this cost us more than our original package for the whole 2 weeks , when we explained this on checkout , there was no concern from the reception as to why we were unhappy or any resolution offered , infact he seemed to find it amusing , on leaving we felt a sense of relief !!! but saying that dubai is the city to visit as we will be returning next year (but to a differant hotel) you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: “Small and Nice”
Reviews.Author: zee25
Reviews.Content: Hotel is ok, normal charges are coparatively high but after negotiation can get fair price. for singles its best place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “What more can go wrong”
Reviews.Author: Mr_DLeeds
Reviews.Content: As soon as reached the hotel it was all obvious that it's not a good hotel. The lobby was too small, maybe as big as a normal bedroom. I had to wait about 3 hours for my room to be ready. The bedroom was very dirty especially the bathroom even though I was in the delux room(The rooms are too over priced). The hotel has a small resturant which is an indian disco at night and a resturant in the mornings. The food can't get anywrose. They hardly serve anything there. The workers are kind but some hardly undrestand english which is not good for a hotel. Thats it for now, but do take my advise ! DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL ! (by the way you can't cancel your booking accurding to their policy, so your money is gone if you book it)

HotelInfo.Name: Semiramis Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Al Rigga Rd | PO Box 81282, Dubai 81282, United Arab Emirates
